description:
The Ticketmaster app makes it easier to buy, sell, and get into the very best of live entertainment – so you can get on with making memories that last.

We give you unparalleled access to thousands of venues, artists, theatre and sports events.

DISCOVER
- Explore millions of events from concerts, festivals and theatre to sport and comedy shows
- Get real-time updates about your favourite artists, events, and venues
- Take control of your experience by browsing available seats and selecting those that best match your preferences

BUY
- Buy your tickets simply and safely
- Credit Card, Gift Cards, instalments and more – Choose the payment option that works best for you

SELL
- Safely and securely resell your tickets to fellow fans if you can’t go
- Set your price for your tickets, and if they sell, you'll be paid through your selected payment method

GET INTO THE SHOW
- No need to worry about printing tickets! Access your tickets and all event details directly from your app
-E asily transfer your tickets to family and friends before the show giving everyone the freedom to enter when they want

Download the Ticketmaster app and go live.

Watch movies, TV shows, live programming, and sports including Amazon MGM Studios-produced series and movies Road House, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, Fallout, Reacher, The Boys, and The Idea of You, and much more. Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you.

App features:
• Download videos to watch anywhere.
• Rent or buy new-release movies and popular TV shows (availability varies by marketplace).
• Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast.
• Create multiple profiles so each person gets a personalized entertainment experience.
• Go behind the scenes of movies and TV shows with exclusive X-Ray access, powered by IMDb (availability varies by marketplace).

Enjoy Prime Video updates on your Apple TV or Mac by downloading the latest app from the App Store on your device. This requires an Apple TV 3rd generation or later, and for Mac, macOS Big Sur 11.4 or later.

If you subscribe to Prime Video via iTunes (where available), payment is charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership automatically renews monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current plan period. Your account is charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each plan period at the rate of your selected plan. Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home. See our Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use, Privacy Notice, and and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

The most talked about shows and movies featuring the worlds of HBO, the DC Universe, Discovery, and beyond.  
 
With HBO Max you'll get: 
• Access to thousands of TV shows and movies.  
• Exclusive, award-winning series that everyone's talking about — like the HBO Originals The Last of Us, Succession, The White Lotus, and House of the Dragon. 
• Stream select live sports from some of your favorite events, leagues and teams. Availability varies by country or region, plan, and by subscription provider. 
• The latest hits from HBO, Max Originals, Discovery, Cartoon Network, ID, DC, Adult Swim, and more. 
• Iconic favorite TV shows like Friends, Rick and Morty, 90 Day Fiancé, Looney Tunes, and more. 
• Family-friendly entertainment for the whole household.  
• Fascinating documentaries and unscripted series.  
 
Features: 
• Enjoy your favorite shows and movies at home or on the go. HBO Max is available on select TV, web browser, mobile, tablet, and gaming console devices. (Device availability may vary by country or region and by plan.) 
• Browse or search with ease across HBO, movies, series, genres, and brands.  
• Download shows and movies you love to watch offline with select plans. (Download limits vary by plan.)  
• Create personalized profiles for the entire household complete with customizable ratings, and profile PIN protection options.  
• Pick up episodes and movies where you left off on any of your favorite devices.  
• Find everything you love, all in one place, with My Stuff.  
• Watch on multiple devices at the same time. (Limits vary by plan.)  
• Stream high-quality video up to 4K resolution and surround sound including Dolby Atmos (where available) on select plans.
 
Content, sports and feature availability on HBO Max may vary by country or region. Sports, where available, may in some countries require a separate add-on which must be added to a base plan. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country or region. Language availability varies by country and region.  
 
You will be charged for your subscription on a recurring basis unless you cancel at least 24 hours before your next billing date. Your App Store account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period. When you cancel, you will have access until the end of your current billing period. You can manage or cancel your subscription by visiting the App Store app or Subscriptions under Settings on your Apple device after purchase. 

Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all countries or regions. HBO Max is only available in certain countries or regions.  
 
Terms of Use: https://hbomax.com/terms-of-use/

Welcome to a totally NORMAL app with games, fun and surprises - and good memories you’ll create along the way. The NORMAL app makes shopping at NORMAL even more fun, because you can win and earn Uniqoins to get your hands on lovely Freebies. And what’s that, you ask?
Well, you’ll have to download the app to find out. Something for something - but definitely something for you.

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!

https://imposterwho.com/terms
https://imposterwho.com/privacy

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. The subscription is valid for 7 days.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew. You will be charged within 24 hours before the start of each subscription period until you cancel your subscription.

Royal Arena app er din personlige genvej til en verden af underholdning i Royal Arena. 

Kalender

Lej et skab

Find vej

Filmstriben er bibliotekernes filmtilbud, hvor du hjemmefra kan låne og se film. Hent app'en og log ind via dit lokale bibliotek eller med MitID. Hvis du ikke allerede er oprettet som bruger på biblioteket i din hjemkommune, skal du efter at have trykket "Log ind" blot vælge "Ny bruger?" og herefter oprette dig.

Når du har lånt en film, kan du se den i 48 timer. Du kan se film på din iPhone eller iPad og via Chromecast eller AirPlay.

Dit bibliotek sætter grænsen for, hvor mange film du kan se om måneden.

Filmstriben har både spillefilm, kort- og dokumentarfilm, børne- og ungdomsfilm, animationsfilm m.m.

Har du spørgsmål så kontakt os via kundeservice.dbc.dk/filmstriben

With TV 2 Play you are able to watch TV 2s live channels and On Demand programs. Furthermore you can watch movies and a lot of children’s content in our children’s universe. The children’s universe has a kids lock that you can manage under ‘Settings’.

To play content you need a subscription to TV 2 Play, and then you are able to login on your iPhone, iPad, iPad Mini or iPod Touch and watch your favorite tv.
We recommend you to use a WiFi connection, but it will also be possible to use the application on a 3G network as long as you have at least 1,5 Mbit/second available.

Local originals .

Med DRTV-appen kan du se DR’s programmer – hvor som helst og når som helst. 
Stream Live TV – Se DR’s programmer, film, TV-serier, dokumentarer – Få DR’s TV-guide lige ved hånden. 
 
UENDELIGT MEGET INDHOLD 
Med DR’s streamingtjeneste DRTV er der masser af underholdning, hvad end du er til film, TV-serier, nyheder og aktualitet eller fascinerende fortællinger. Og hver dag udgives der nye programmer, du kan dykke ned i.  
Vi har altid masser af dansk indhold med noget på hjerte – fra stærke dramaserier til dybdeborende dokumentarer og børneprogrammer i verdensklasse. 

SE ALLE DR’S KANALER 
Du kan i appen se Live-TV fra DR1, DR2 og Ramasjang fra fanen ‘Live’. Du kan til en hver tid starte et program fra en af DR’s kanaler DR1, DR2, DR3, Minisjang, Ramasjang og Ultra. 

TV-GUIDE 
Bare ét klik væk har du DR’s TV-guide ved hånden. Du får en oversigt over alle DR’s kanaler, hvad der kommer i TV i dag, i morgen, og hvornår dit yndlingsprogram vises live. 

LOG-IND 
Du kan lave dit eget log-ind, så du får anbefalinger skræddersyet til dig. Hvis du er logget ind, vil DRTV endda huske, hvor meget du har set af et program, hvis du vælger at stoppe undervejs. Så kan du begynde på dit yndlingsprogram hjemme foran computeren - og se videre på mobilen, når du er på farten. 

TAG DRTV MED PÅ FERIE 
Når du rejser I et EØS-land, kan du nu se alt indhold i DRTV-appen. Du skal logge ind på DRTV og bekræfte med NemID, at du har dansk bopæl, så er du klar til at streame DRTVs indhold.  

CHROMECAST & APPLE TV  
Hvis du foretrækker at se programmerne på en stor skærm, kan du nemt caste dem til dit tv via for eksempel Chromecast eller Apple TV.

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Please note that the App Privacy information applies to information collected through the Netflix iOS, iPadOS and tvOS apps. See the Netflix Privacy Statement (link below) to learn more about information we collect in other contexts, including account registration.

Podimo – Podcasts & audiobooks

Unlimited Listening

Make the most of your time – listening to the best stories with Podimo
Are you looking for a new and exciting audio journey? Dive into an intriguing world of content with Podimo and immerse yourself in gripping true crime shows, love & romance, personal stories, the latest gossip and much more.

Become a member of our community and get:
- Unlimited listening.
- Access to hundreds of exclusive podcasts & more than 10.000 audiobooks.
- Up close and personal with our creators.

Start your free trial now. No commitment – cancel anytime.

A brand-new way of discovering podcasts: Video Trailers
At Podimo we take you along an innovative and one-of-a-kind discovery experience not only through audio but also sweeping visual content. Thanks to short video trailers, created by and with our dedicated creators, you get the unique chance to:
find out what our exclusive shows are all about before diving in.
get personal with your favorite creators and see them behind the scenes. 
be the first to glimpse at the podcasts that everyone will be talking about tomorrow.

The right content for your every mood
Whether you are craving a thrilling crime show, looking for some light entertainment or need a little pick-me-up after a rough day – Podimo is always there for you. Grab your earphones and listen to our podcasts and audiobooks while cooking, cleaning or just relaxing. Thanks to personal recommendations you will easily find your new favorite show and dive into addictive and inspiring stories.

Quality content – handpicked for you
At Podimo we are all about creating the best possible audio experience for you. We have made it our mission to be the home of the best podcasts, audiobooks and short fiction formats. We offer you an exciting mixture of high class true crime formats, up close talk shows, personal stories and intimate encounters. Podimo’s wide selection of top formats guarantee to entertain, distract and capture you!

Therefore we work with popular and well-known hosts that have interesting stories to tell and exciting guests. Our vast and ever growing selection of exclusive podcasts and international audiobooks includes top creators and authors from all over the world. Discover your next addiction among our many categories and experience the power of listening.

The best content for your kids too 

With Podimo your little ones can listen to our handpicked audiobooks and podcasts for kids from 3-12 years old. Let your kids take a break from the screen and listen to stories with popular and beloved characters. 

With the Podimo app you get:
- Video trailers: your next binge-worthy show is just a swipe away. 
- Personalized recommendations: based on your interests and listening habits.
- Hand-picked content: podcasts, audiobooks and radio plays for every mood and time, chosen by our editorial team.
- A true “home”: one tab for all the podcasts you follow, episodes you're listening to and new releases from your number one shows.
- Offline listening: save your data plan by downloading podcasts and audiobooks to listen on the go.
- Sleep Timer: drift away to the voices of your favorite storytellers.
- Sharing: share video trailers and episodes you've enjoyed with friends and family.
- Updates: get notified when the podcasts you follow release a new episode and when exciting content from your favorite genres is available.

Tune the world out, turn the volume up, and enjoy!

With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere. Buy PC games and get the latest game and community news - while protecting your Steam account.

Shop Steam
Browse the Steam catalog of PC games from your phone. Never miss a sale again.

Steam Guard
Protect your Steam account and make sign in faster with two-factor authentication.
• Two-factor authentication to ensure you’re the only one with access to your account
• QR code sign in - Scan a QR code to sign into Steam instead of entering a password or…
• Sign in confirmation - Confirm your regular Steam sign ins with simple “approve” or “deny”

Library & Remote downloads
The new Library view makes it easy to view game content, discussions, guides, support, and more. Plus you can manage game downloads and updates to your PC from your phone.

Trade and Market Confirmations
Speed up item trades and sales by using your phone to confirm them.

Plus
• A personalized News feed based on your Library with the latest news, events, and content updates direct from publishers and game developers.
• Customizable Steam notifications: wishlist, sales, comments, trades, discussions, friend requests, and more.
• Access to the entire Steam Community - discussions, groups, guides, Market, Workshop, broadcasts, and more.
• Access to your friends, friend activity, groups, screenshots, inventory, wallet, and more.
• Authorized Devices - Manage access to the devices your account has signed in
• An improved Store browsing experience for mobile screens
• Support for using multiple Steam accounts in the app
• Support for customizing your app's main tabs

Køb biografbilletter i app’en og spring køen over  
Med NF Bio-app’en fra Nordisk Film Biografer kan du bestille biografbilletter, se trailere, holde styr på dine billetter direkte i appen og meget mere. Undgå køen ved billetlugen og gå direkte ind til forestillingen – bare vis billetten direkte fra appen.

Del betaling mellem venner
Nu behøver du ikke længere skrive rundt til dine venner om betaling fra andre apps, bankoverførsler og så videre. Med NF Bio-app’en kan du reservere din biograftur og sende dine venner et betalingslink, så de kan betale for deres egne billetter direkte i app’en! Du får hele overblikket i app’en, så du nemt kan holde styr på alle billetter, hvilke som er købt af hvem, samt hvilke billetter der fortsat mangler betaling. 

Et filmunivers direkte ved hånden
Med NF Bio-app’en kan du let og bekvemt gå på opdagelse blandt aktuelle og kommende film, læse resumér, se trailere og købe billetter. I appen har du et overskueligt overblik over premieredato, varighed, censur, skuespillere og meget mere.

+18 | Stopspillet.dk | ROFUS.nu | Spil med omtanke

Den officielle Lotto app fra Danske Spil er din unikke indgang til milliondrømmene! 
Med Lotto app’en har du alle lotterierne fra Danske Spil lige ved hånden. 

SPIL PÅ DET HELE Spil Lotto, Vikinglotto, Eurojackpot, Keno, Alt eller Intet eller Quick. Få det fulde overblik over dine yndlingsspil, se de seneste vindertal og følg spændingen i dine spil uge for uge. Med app’en i hånden går du aldrig glip af de ekstra store puljer. 
 
ALT ELLER INTET Alt eller Intet er vores nyeste lotteri. Alt eller Intet er spillet, hvor du kan vinde ved enten at være heldig eller uheldig - 12 rigtige giver nemlig lige så meget som 0 rigtige. Vind op til 500.000 kr. hver dag. 
 
SPIL SAMMEN Spil Sammen er for dig som har lyst til at spille lotto med andre mennesker. Opret din helt egen lottoklub, og spil med venner, familie eller lige hvem du har lyst til. Deltagerne deler udgifterne til kuponerne, men naturligvis også præmien. Spil Sammen kan bruges til Lotto, Vikinglotto og Eurojackpot. 

SE OM DU HAR VUNDET Se straks om der er gevinst ved at scanne dine fysiske kuponer fra Lotto, Vikinglotto, Eurojackpot og Keno.  

LOG-IN MED DIT FINGERAFTRYK ELLER FACE-ID Når du første gang logger ind, er det nemt og hurtigt at logge ind med dit fingeraftryk eller face-id efterfølgende. Så springer du besværet med dit NemID over. Når du er logget ind kan du også tanke din spilkonto op og hurtigt komme videre til alt det sjove. 

FIND FORHANDLER Foretrækker du at have en fysisk kupon i hånden, kan app’en hurtigt og enkelt vise vej til nærmeste forhandler.

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

Movely
Make your photo move
Turn any still image into an eye-catching AI video in seconds. Movely combines state-of-the-art motion generation with an interface so simple you can create and share animated portraits, memes and story posts before your coffee cools.
Key Features
- One-Tap Animation – import a selfie, pet photo or illustration and watch it come alive in under 3 seconds.
- 1000+ AI effects – epic morph, neon cyberpunk, cutie animal, cartoon loops and more are added daily so your feed never feels stale.
- AI Dance Effects – drop your photo into today’s viral TikTok/Instagram dance moves; the model maps limbs and timing so your avatar grooves perfectly to trending beats.
- Natural Body Motion – the latest motion engine infers full-body dynamics—shoulders, arms and subtle torso shifts—so clips look like real film, not a cardboard cut-out.
- Batch Results – get up to 10 variants from one upload and choose the vibe that fits your mood.
- 1080p Export & Direct Share – post straight to Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat or save to Camera Roll with no watermarks on premium.
- Future Baby & Mash-ups – blend two faces, swap outfits or generate playful “what-if” videos for instant social hype.
Why Movely?
Because every photo is a playground. Whether you’re spicing up a profile pic, teasing new merch or just making friends laugh, Movely’s AI lets creativity outweigh complexity. No timelines, no keyframes—just pure motion magic.
Daily Free Generations
Open Movely every day to claim your free effect generation. Each visit unlocks a daily video generations gift so you can keep experimenting, stay on trend and create without limits.
Need Help or Have Ideas?
We love feedback almost as much as we love animated selfies. Email us or tag your creations with #Movely for a chance to be featured.
Download Movely today—make your photo move and show the world that every photo really is a playground.

- Terms of US: https://movelyai.com/terms

Det Kongelige Teaters app gør det nemmere at bestille drikkevarer, holde styr på dine billetter og have dine fordele lige ved hånden.

Se dine billetter
Alle dine billetter til kommende forestillinger er samlet i app’en. Hvis du skal i teatret med andre, har du mulighed for at dele billetterne med dine ledsagere. På den måde får du alle informationer om scene, tidspunkt, sædenummer osv. ét sted og I kan begynde at glæde jer til en tur i teatret.

Pausebestilling
Tre dage inden en forestilling og helt frem til pausen på spilledagen kan du bestille et udvalg af drikkevarer og snacks gennem app’en. På den måde springer du køen over og kan nyde pausen og de smukke omgivelser. Du kan betale via MobilePay eller indløse dine gratis drikkevarer. Har du købt billet kan du bestille til pausen en hel sæson frem.

Se dine fordele
På din profil får du overblik over dine fordele. Har du et sæsonkort eller et teaterkort kan du se, hvor mange gratis drikkevarer du har tilbage. Skulle du have glemt dit sæsonkort eller teaterkort derhjemme kan du også vise dit kort i app’en.

Rigtig god fornøjelse!
